0.name: Nether
0.description: This place barely exists - a swirling set of winds and purple hue encompass the entirety of the place.

exits.description: A floating, swirling passage leads to the north

1.name: Cameriel
1.description: A floating city set against a blue sky consisting of floating patches of dirt, covered in green grass adorned with flowers of many colors.

exits.description: A floating, swirling passage leads to the south

2.name: Darkrend
2.description: A grey and desolate sky, scattered with what seems like constant lightning strikes

exits.description: A floating, swirling passage leads to the south

3.name: Tubeliam
3.description: A busseling city of cast iron tubes, humid with steam and smoke.

exits.description: A floating, swirling passage leads to the south

4.name: The Hub
4.description: The capital city of the continent of Messianika. This is the only region that has a solid landscape capable of having streets, buildings and general life.

exits.description: A floating, swirling passage leads to the south
